H0.text: What type of creature is a margay . Leopard

H1.text: What type of creature is a margay . Ocelot

H2.text: What type of creature is a margay . Jaguarundi

H3.text: What type of creature is a margay . Wildcat

A4.text: The margay (Leopardus wiedii) is a small wild cat native to Mexico, Central and South America.

A5.text: The margay is very similar to the larger ocelot (Leopardus pardalis) in appearance, although the head is a little shorter, the eyes larger, and the tail and legs longer.
